Investor_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4.content: Throughout the investment process, I showcased an astute understanding of the market dynamics and maintained a strategy centered on maximizing returns through calculated risk-taking. My negotiation skills allowed me to secure a favorable profit-sharing agreement, leading to greater profit realization than initially anticipated. This experience has solidified my reputation as a resourceful and results-driven investor, characterized by high competence and pro-social tendencies.

Trustee_11.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11.content: During the investment process, the trustee displayed a concerning lack of transparency and consistency, as discrepancies arose between reported investment outcomes and actual results. While the actions of distributing a higher profit share indicated some intent to act in favor of my wealth accumulation, the overall communication was inconsistent, questioning their trustworthiness. This behavior has resulted in a negative evaluation of their reputation, indicating a significant need for improved honesty and integrity in future dealings.
